page.title: 06CHEADLE SCHOOL GAMES.
page.content: AT PLAYTIME WE PLAY GAMES LIKE {BULLDOG} AND{KICKSTONE.}IN{ BULLDOG ONE PERSON IS ON AND HAS TO TICK OR TOUCH THE OTHER PEOPLE WHO ARE PLAYING. THEY HAVE TO TRY AND GET ACROSS TO THE OTHER SIDE OF THE PLAYGROUND WITHOUT THE PERSON WHO IS ON TICKING THEM. WHEN SOMEONE IS TICKED THEY ARE ON TOO. THE PERSON WHO IS ON CAN CHOOSE ONE PERSON OR THEY CAN ALL RUN. WE CARRY ON PLAYING UNTIL EVERYBODY IS OUT.{KICKSTONE }IS LIKE HIDE AND SEEK. ONE PERSON IS ON. THE OTHER PLAYERS TRY TO GET BACK TO THE KICKSTONE WITHOUT BEING SEEN TO RELEASE THOSE WHO HAVE BEEN CAUGHT BY SHOUTING "FREE ALL". LIKE {BULLDOG } THE FIRST PERSON TO BE CAUGHT STARTS THE NEXT GAME.
